Package shef.mt.tools

This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BParser
    A wrapper around Berkeley Parser.
    BParserProcessor
    A processor class for the BParser.
    ConnectivesProcessor  
    DiscourseRepetition
    This class is part of the implementation of the document-level quality estimation features.
    EnglishTokenizer
    A wrapper around the moses tokenizer
    FileModel
    A FileModel contains information about the input text: the words contained and their frequency in the reference corpus It registers 2 resources: "words" and "freq", required by BB features 20-29
    Giza
    This class models the information stored in a giza translation file
    In order to minimise the amount of giza information we store in memory, we will only hold in the translations for those words found in the source text
    Giza2
    This class models the information stored in an alternative giza translation file
    In order to minimise the amount of giza information we store in memory, we will only hold in the translations for those words found in the source text
    GlobalLexicon  
    LanguageModel
    A LanguageModel stores information about the ngram content of language model file It provides access to information such as the frequency of ngrams, and the cut-off points for various ngram frequencies
    MorphAnalyser
    MorphAnalyser encapsulates the MADA mophological analyser for Arabic It requires the MADA install path and the name of the cript to be run and launches the perl script on the input file specified MADA produces its output in the same folder as the input file, therefore care has to be taken that the required writing rights are available in that folder
    MorphAnalysisProcessor
    This is a processor for the output of the MADA morphological analyser for Arabic
    MTOutputProcessor
    This class receives as input an XML file containing sentences and lists of translation with various attributes and reads it into Sentence objects
    NERProcessor
    This class is a processor of files containing Named Entity information
    NGramExec
    This is a wrapper around the SRILM ngram applications
    NGramProcessor
    This class processes a file containing ngrams and produces a LanguageModel
    OpenFstWrapper
    This is a wrapper around OpenFst functionality.
    POSProcessor
    The POSProcessor class analyses a file produced by a pos tagger and sets certain values to a Sentence object These values are, currently, the number of nouns, verbs, pronouns and content words
    PosTagger
    Base class for part-of-speech tagger wrappers
    PosTreeTagger
    PosTreeTagger is a wrapper around the TreeTagger
    PPLProcessor
    Processes a file containing ngram probabilities and perplexities and sets the corresponding values to the current sentence
    Resource  
    ResourceManager  
    ResourcePipeline  
    ResourceProcessor
    Abstract class that is the base class for all classes that process the output files of pre-processing tools
    ResourceProcessorTwoSentences  
    TerminologyProcessor
    loads monolingual and bilingual terminology, if the corresponding entries in the configuration are set; fills some values to be later used as the following features: 1.
    Tokenizer
    A wrapper around the moses tokenizer
    TopicDistributionProcessor
    This class allows to process a file containing topic distributions.
    Triggers  
    TriggersProcessor  
    WordAlign
    This class encapsulates word alignment information It registers the resource "gizaAlign"

Package shef.mt.tools Description

This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools
